TextView.android:text: This method consists in that given n + 1 points (Xi, f (Xi)), we look a polynomial P of degree N at most that passes through each one of them. The polynomial is of the form: Pn (x) = b0 + b1 (x-x0) + b2 (x-x0) (x-x1) + ... + bn (x-x0) ... (x-xn -1). The diagonal of the generated chart are the values of bn that is the result of their divided differences.
